name: ineducable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not able to be educated or to learn: It is now recognized that no child is ineducable. She had been written off by the teachers at her previous school as virtually ineducable.
More examplesFewer examplesAt one time, children with this condition were dismissed as ineducable. Because of his dyslexia, my grandfather was considered ineducable and removed from school.The colonizers regarded the indigenous people as fundamentally ignorant and ineducable.She had to battle against the authorities who had declared that her son was ineducable.
